channel.title: Clients
channel.description:
I've started to do a bit of client coding. But i need to know some starters.. 3 questions.
1) Where do i change the text on the actual Frame of the client? Like at the top it says Silabsoft Client v4.0. How can i change that? What class :o?
2) How do i change the redstones?
3) What class to change / modify items?
Many thanks.

item.title: Clients
item.dc:creator: @Mackrack360_Racer_D Mackrack360 + Racer D
item.description:
@Mackrack360_Racer_D wrote:

I could tell you where to change the redstones.

Read full topic

item.title: Clients
item.dc:creator: @Paintball199 Paintball199
item.description:
@Paintball199 wrote:

[quote=“Java Guru, post:15, topic:164507”][quote author=SWAT link=topic=223353.msg1928767#msg1928767 date=1197592533]

Wich color ints did you change 156 or 160?

you cant change the green part

So i can’t make my own cape :(…?

You can you just need to learn how to cache edit.

There maybe like 1 or 2 member that can on this forum
[/quote]

Silabsoft and ownage plz.[/quote]
He Means Creating Other models. Like Strenght Cape Has Another Picture & a Fire Cape
Color.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Ok so um, whats the int for middle of skillcape? Like the green part with the fist on? I changed all colours, but yet none change the green. Just the outline. Look.


The green part, how do i change that colour, and the picture?

Can you get me a link for an itemdump? The link expired on that haxor’s post.

Read full topic

item.title: Clients
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“SWAT, post:4, topic:164507”][quote author=X-J-K-X link=topic=223353.msg1928670#msg1928670 date=1197588804]

I’ve started to do a bit of client coding. But i need to know some starters… 3 questions.

  1. Where do i change the text on the actual Frame of the client? Like at the top it says Silabsoft Client v4.0. How can i change that? What class :o?

  2. How do i change the redstones?

  3. What class to change / modify items?

Many thanks.

  1. Frame_Sub1.java

  2. Dunno.

  3. class8.java

2 more questions lol.

  1. How do i find the colour numbers for the items? It’s got like.

class8.anIntArray160[0] = 41416;
class8.anIntArray156[1] = 54503;
class8.anIntArray160[1] = 41416;

What does that mean?

  1. I changed the numbers to random, and it only changes the edge of skillcape? Doesn’t change the middle, green, or the shoulder parts which is red. Or the picture on the actual cape. How i change that?
    [/quote]

You should use a itemdump[/quote]

I’m using your base, csk-client. Whats an itemdump. lol

Read full topic
